description: Origination Request - For raw control of the endpoints
title: Origination Request

Application-Name.description: What to do with the channel once it is answered

Endpoints.description: The list of endpoints to originate to

SIP-Headers.description: Option list of SIP headers to set on the outgoing SIP payload

Custom-Channel-Vars.description: Option list of channel variables to set on the outgoind channel

Export-Custom-Channel-Vars.description: List of channel variable names to export to the other leg

Outbound-Call-ID.description: Set the outbound call-id (instead of having it generated)

Existing-Call-ID.description: Use this call-id to determine the media switch to use for the outbound leg

Fax-Identity-Number.description: The telephone number to be used within the FAX exchange

Fax-Identity-Name.description: If set, a header line will be inserted at the start of each page

Eavesdrop-Group-ID.description: Limit the channels that can eavesdrop on this channel to those with the group id
